name: fastest
description: Fastest ghost cms base theme. Fastest is lite wight, modern open-source theme

scripts.dev: npx nodemon --watch . --ext js,css,hbs --ignore assets/dist --ignore node_modules --exec "node esbuild.config.js --watch"
scripts.zip: npm run build && bestzip $npm_package_name.zip assets/dist/* assets/images/* partials/* members/* *.hbs package.json
